data.title: Eric Trump-Linked American Bitcoin Stock Crashes 40% as Lockup Ends
data.description: Shares of American Bitcoin, the mining and accumulation firm co-founded by Eric Trump and Donald Trump Jr., tumbled sharply on Tuesday after a portion of the company’s stock was released from its lockup period. Key Takeaways: American Bitcoin shares plunged nearly 50% after newly unlocked stock hit the market following ...
data.keywords: Eric Trump, Donald Trump, American Bitcoin, ABTC, Trump family
